bridge-type.label: FlicButton Bridge
bridge-type.description: This bridge represents a running instance of the fliclib-linux-hci server (flicd).

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Flic daemon (flicd) hostname
parameter.description: IP or Host name of the Flic daemon (flicd). Defaults to localhost.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Flic daemon (flicd) port
parameter.description: Port where flicd is running. Defaults to 5551.

thing-type.label: FlicButton Thing
thing-type.description: The thing(-type) representing a Flic Button

channel-type.label: FlicButton Switch
channel-type.description: The Switch representing a Flic button. Will be "ON" if the flicbutton is currently pressed. E.g. to trigger a rule "onRelease", listen to state changes from "ON" to "OFF".
